contentText.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Attention robotic workers!","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"On March 9, 2023, the D-Corp planetary activities got a whole lot more exciting.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This free update introduces PvP - player-versus-player gameplay. The lovable bitbots can finally hammer it out among themselves in this team-building (or should we say team-demolishing…) exercise called Arena Mode.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Assemble the crew, and get ready to fight for glory in the ultimate explosive showdown for 2 to 4 players. Explore 8 new levels, find 12 new hats to unlock, and meet the new enemy called Loot Goblin. Who will collect the most scrap, and who gets to sit on the toilet throne?!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our CEO, Mr. Brain-In-A-Jar, was quoted saying, \"We’re thrilled for this great opportunity to encourage team spirit, boost profits, and have some good old-fashioned fun. Let’s be honest, who doesn’t love a little friendly competition?\"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Fun is mandatory - enjoy!","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hMXs9YbdAfs"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hMXs9YbdAfs","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285040/DCorp/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285040/DCorp/","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

nodes.title: New Website
nodes.shortText: RIBBIT, and welcome to our newly updated, super fresh website!

nodes.title: D-Corp on Nintendo Switch
nodes.shortText: Frogsong Studios are happy to announce that D-Corp was released on Nintendo Switch the 21st of July 2023, in collaboration with Red Deer Games.

nodes.title: D-Corp Arena Mode
nodes.shortText: This free update introduces PvP - player-versus-player gameplay.
